docs.text: Jiemin Fang (方傑民) ¶ Email : GitHub | Google Scholar | DBLP I am a PhD candidate at the Institute of Artificial Intelligence and School of Electronic Information and Communications (EIC), Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST), supervised by Prof. Wenyu Liu and Prof. Xinggang Wang . I received my B.E. degree from EIC , HUST in 2018. My research interests mainly lie in efficient deep learning from neural architecture perspectives and neural rendering. I am hunting for a full-time job. Welcome to contact me via Email or Wechat ! News ¶ Aug. 2022 - TiNeuVox is conditionally accepted to ACM SIGGRAPH Asia 2022. Jul. 2022 - I am honored to be awarded the HUST Academic Star (华中科技大学“学术新星”) ! Apr. 2022 - Our EfficientPose is chosen for the CVMJ 2021 best paper award. Mar. 2022 - Two papers are accepted by CVPR 2022. Jan. 2022 - BINGO is accepted by ICLR 2022. Jul. 2021 - One paper is accepted by ICCV 2021. Dec. 2020 - " FNA++: Fast Network Adaptation via Parameter Remapping and Architecture Search " is published in IEEE TPAMI. Nov. 2020 - I have released a PyTorch toolkit dali-pytorch for accelerating ImageNet training with NVIDIA DALI. It improves the training speed dramatically with maintaining high performance. Publications ¶ Journal Papers ¶ FNA++: Fast Network Adaptation via Parameter Remapping and Architecture Search Jiemin Fang *, Yuzhu Sun*, Qian Zhang, Kangjian Peng, Yuan Li, Wenyu Liu, Xinggang Wang IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence ( TPAMI ) 2021 PDF | Code | BibTeX EAT-NAS: Elastic Architecture Transfer for Accelerating Large-scale Neural Architecture Search Jiemin Object Information and True Labels Jie Qin*, Jiemin Fang *, Qian Zhang, Wenyu Liu, Xingang Wang, Xinggang Wang arXiv:2012.11101, 2020 PDF | BibTeX Internships ¶ Jan. 2021 - present, Huawei Cloud in Shanghai working with Prof. Qi Tian , Dr. Lingxi Xie and Dr. Xiaopeng Zhang . Aug. 2018 - Nov. 2020, Horizon Robotics in Beijing working with Dr. Qian Zhang . Academic Services ¶ Reviewer of IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (IEEE TPAMI), IEEE Transactions on Neural Networks and Learning Systems (IEEE TNNLS), Neural Networks, Image and Vision Computing, SCIENCE CHINA Information Sciences. NeurIPS 2022, ECCV 2022, ICML 2022, CVPR 2022, ICLR 2022, NeurIPS 2021, ICCV 2021, ICML 2021, CVPR 2021, AAAI 2021. Competition Experience ¶ I ever participated in RoboMaster Robotics Competition. I worked on embedded development and achieved the national second prize in 2017. Then in 2018, I led the team to win the national second prize. Awards ¶ HUST Academic Star (华中科技大学“学术新星”) National Scholarship for PhD Student, 2021 National Scholarship for Master Student, 2020 National Scholarship for Undergraduate Student, 2017 * denotes equal contribution. ↩

docs.text: Email : GitHub | Google Scholar | DBLP I am a PhD candidate at the Institute of Artificial Intelligence and School of Electronic Information and Communications (EIC), Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST), supervised by Prof. Wenyu Liu and Prof. Xinggang Wang . I received my B.E. degree from EIC , HUST in 2018. My research interests mainly lie in efficient deep learning from neural architecture perspectives and neural rendering. I am hunting for a full-time job. Welcome to contact me via Email or Wechat !
docs.title: Jiemin Fang (方傑民)

docs.text: Aug. 2022 - TiNeuVox is conditionally accepted to ACM SIGGRAPH Asia 2022. Jul. 2022 - I am honored to be awarded the HUST Academic Star (华中科技大学“学术新星”) ! Apr. 2022 - Our EfficientPose is chosen for the CVMJ 2021 best paper award. Mar. 2022 - Two papers are accepted by CVPR 2022. Jan. 2022 - BINGO is accepted by ICLR 2022. Jul. 2021 - One paper is accepted by ICCV 2021. Dec. 2020 - " FNA++: Fast Network Adaptation via Parameter Remapping and Architecture Search " is published in IEEE TPAMI. Nov. 2020 - I have released a PyTorch toolkit dali-pytorch for accelerating ImageNet training with NVIDIA DALI. It improves the training speed dramatically with maintaining high performance.
